text: Hagi anampina mago nera pristi kukena hu'nea ne' mani'ne. Ana ne' agi'a Ahiza mani'neankino, nefa'a Ahitupu'e. Hagi Ahitupu nefu'a Ikabotie. Hagi Ahiza'a Ahitubu kasentegeno, Ahitubuna Finiasi kasentegeno, Finiasina Eli kasente'ne. Higeno Eli'a za'za kukena hu'neno Ra Anumzamofo pristi eri'za e'nerino Sailo kumate mani'nea nere. Hagi mago vahe'mo'e huno Jonatanima kumama atreno hate'ma viazana keno antahinora osu'ne.
